name: Anywhere For You
content: 我愿意为你去任何地方
我愿意为你做任何事情
I'd walk halfway around the world
For just one kiss from you
就是为了能得到你的亲吻
Far beyond the call of love
The sun the stars the moon
只要有你的爱指引我前进
I won't lose my way believe me
Even trough the darkest night you know
尽管是在最黑暗的夜晚
我愿意为你去任何地方
我愿意为你做任何事情
Your love as far as I can see
Is all I'm ever gonna need
我知道这份爱是真实的
Baby I'd go anywhere for you
I used to think that dreams were just
只是对于多愁善感的傻瓜说的
Who'd give their love so true
But I knew the very minute
都不能没有你在我的生命中
And now I want the whole wide world
我愿意为你去任何地方
我愿意为你做任何事情
Your love as far as I can see
Is all I'm ever gonna need
我知道这份爱是真实的
Baby I'd go anywhere for you
Hey baby hey baby hey baby oohhh
我愿意为你去任何地方
我愿意为你做任何事情
Your love as far as I can see
Is all I'm ever gonna need
我知道这份爱是真实的
Baby I'd go anywhere for you
我愿意为你去任何地方
我愿意为你做任何事情
Your love as far as I can see
Is all I'm ever gonna need
我知道这份爱是真实的
Baby I'd go anywhere for you
宝贝，我愿意为你去任何地方为了你
